pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, June 9, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation during the Summit Opening of the Progressive Governance Digital Summit 2021. He will speak alongside the Vice-Chancellor and Federal Minister of Finance of Germany Olaf Scholz, the former Prime Minister of Denmark Helle Thorning-Schmidt, and the President of the Italian National Innovation Fund Francesca Bria.

The Summit Opening will be streamed live via the following link: https://progressive-governance.eu/live

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
